meanings.definition: To join or attach by stitches
meanings.sent1: She sews the pieces of fabric together to make a dress.
meanings.sent2: My grandma sews beautiful quilts for us.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to sew a button on its metal arm.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness sews our community together like threads in a tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The tailor sews intricate patterns with precision and care.

meanings.definition: To work with a needle and thread
meanings.sent1: He sews carefully to avoid pricking his fingers.
meanings.sent2: Mom sews a new button on my favorite shirt.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to sew with a ball of yarn but got tangled instead.
meanings.sent4: His words sew a story that captivates the audience.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer sews unique designs that stand out on the runway.

meanings.definition: To mend or repair by sewing
meanings.sent1: She sews a patch on the torn jeans.
meanings.sent2: The tailor sews up the hole in the jacket.
meanings.sent3: The magical needle sews up the rip with a single touch.
meanings.sent4: Her love sews broken hearts back together.
meanings.sent5: The seamstress sews memories into every stitch of the quilt.
